It_PRP was_VBD an_DT old_JJ and_CC dirty_JJ wooden_JJ structure_NN ,_, sadly_RB in_IN need_NN of_IN repair_NN ._.
But_CC it_PRP was_VBD a_DT landmark_NN ._.
It_PRP had_VBD been_VBN there_RB 00_CD years_NNS or_CC more_JJR and_CC everybody_NN in_IN town_NN ,_, black_JJ and_CC white_JJ ,_, knew_VBD of_IN it_PRP ._.
It_PRP had_VBD just_RB suffered_VBN a_DT calamity_NN ,_, the_DT final_JJ crisis_NN in_IN a_DT long_JJ series_NN of_IN calamities_NNS ._.
For_IN the_DT old_JJ preacher_NN who_WP had_VBD been_VBN there_RB twenty-five_CD years_NNS was_VBD dead_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT city_NN mourned_VBD him_PRP ._.
He_PRP was_VBD a_DT loud-voiced_JJ man_NN ,_, once_RB vigorous_JJ but_CC for_IN many_JJ years_NNS now_RB declining_VBG in_IN strength_NN and_CC ability_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD stern_JJ and_CC overbearing_JJ with_IN his_PRP$ flock_NN ,_, but_CC obsequious_JJ and_CC conciliatory_JJ with_IN the_DT whites_NNS ,_, especially_RB the_DT rich_JJ who_WP partly_RB supported_VBD the_DT church_NN ._.
The_DT Deacon_NNP Board_NNP ,_, headed_VBN by_IN a_DT black_JJ man_NN named_VBN Carlson_NNP ,_, had_VBD practically_RB taken_VBN over_RP as_IN the_DT pastor_NN grew_VBD old_JJ ,_, and_CC had_VBD its_PRP$ way_NN with_IN the_DT support_NN of_IN the_DT Amen_JJ corner_NN ._.
The_DT characteristic_JJ thing_NN about_IN this_DT church_NN was_VBD its_PRP$ Amen_JJ corner_NN and_CC the_DT weekly_JJ religious_JJ orgy_NN ._.
A_DT knot_NN of_IN old_JJ worshippers_NNS ,_, chiefly_RB women_NNS ,_, listened_VBD weekly_RB to_IN a_DT sermon_NN ._.
It_PRP began_VBD invariably_RB in_IN low_JJ tones_NNS ,_, almost_RB conversational_JJ ,_, and_CC then_RB gradually_RB worked_VBD up_RB to_IN high_JJ ,_, shrill_JJ appeals_NNS to_IN God_NNP and_CC man_NN ._.
And_CC then_RB the_DT Amen_JJ corner_NN took_VBD hold_NN ,_, re-enacting_VBG a_DT form_NN of_IN group_NN participation_NN in_IN worship_NN that_WP stemmed_VBD from_IN years_NNS before_IN the_DT Greek_JJ chorus_NN ,_, spreading_VBG down_IN through_IN the_DT African_JJ forest_NN ,_, overseas_JJ to_IN the_DT West_NNPS Indies_NNPS ,_, and_CC then_RB here_RB in_IN Alabama_NNP ._.
With_IN shout_NN and_CC slow_JJ dance_NN ,_, with_IN tears_NNS and_CC song_NN ,_, with_IN scream_NN and_CC contortion_NN ,_, the_DT corner_NN group_NN was_VBD beset_VBN by_IN hysteria_NN and_CC shivering_NN ,_, wailing_NN ,_, shouting_NN ,_, possession_NN of_IN something_NN that_WP seemed_VBD like_IN an_DT alien_JJ and_CC outside_JJ force_NN ._.

It_PRP sometimes_RB ended_VBD in_IN death-like_JJ trances_NNS with_IN many_JJ lying_VBG exhausted_VBN and_CC panting_VBG on_IN chair_NN and_CC floor_NN ._.
To_IN most_JJS of_IN those_DT who_WP composed_VBD the_DT Amen_JJ corner_NN it_PRP was_VBD a_DT magnificent_JJ and_CC beautiful_JJ experience_NN ,_, something_NN for_IN which_WDT they_PRP lived_VBD from_IN week_NN to_IN week_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD often_RB re-enacted_VBN in_IN less_JJR wild_JJ form_NN at_IN the_DT Wednesday_NNP night_NN prayer_NN meeting_NN ._.

Mickie_NNP had_VBD a_DT pleasant_JJ glow_NN as_IN he_PRP said_VBD ,_, "_`` You_PRP see_VBP ,_, both_DT of_IN them_PRP ,_, I_PRP mean_VBP the_DT President_NNP and_CC Jeff_NNP Lawrence_NNP ,_, are_VBP romantics_NNS ._.
A_DT romantic_JJ is_VBZ one_NN who_WP thinks_VBZ the_DT world_NN is_VBZ divinely_RB inspired_VBN and_CC all_DT he_PRP has_VBZ to_TO do_VB is_VBZ find_VB the_DT right_JJ key_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB divine_JJ justice_NN and_CC altruism_NN will_MD appear_VB ._.
It_PRP 's_POS like_IN focusing_VBG a_DT camera_NN ;_: the_DT distant_JJ ship_NN is_VBZ n't_RB there_RB until_IN you_PRP get_VBP the_DT focus_NN ._.

Given_IN the_DT conceptual_JJ context_NN within_IN which_WDT ancient_JJ thought_NN thrived_VBD ,_, how_WRB could_MD anyone_NN have_VBP questioned_VBN this_DT principle_NN ?_.
The_DT reasons_NNS for_IN this_DT are_VBP partly_RB observational_JJ ,_, partly_RB philosophical_JJ ,_, and_CC reinforced_VBN by_IN other_JJ aesthetic_JJ and_CC cultural_JJ factors_NNS ._.
First_RB ,_, the_DT observational_JJ reasons_NNS ._.
The_DT obvious_JJ natural_JJ fact_NN to_IN ancient_JJ thinkers_NNS was_VBD the_DT diurnal_JJ rotation_NN of_IN the_DT heavens_NNS ._.
Not_RB only_RB did_VBD constellations_NNS like_IN Draco_NNP ,_, Cepheus_NNP ,_, and_CC Cassiopeia_NNP spin_VB circles_NNS around_IN the_DT pole_NN ,_, but_CC stars_NNS which_WDT were_VBD not_RB circumpolar_JJ rose_VBD and_CC set_VBD at_IN the_DT same_JJ place_NN on_IN the_DT horizon_NN each_DT night_NN ._.
Nor_CC did_VBD a_DT constellation_NN 's_POS stars_NNS vary_VB in_IN brightness_NN during_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN their_PRP$ nocturnal_JJ flights_NNS ._.
The_DT conclusion_NN --_: the_DT distances_NNS of_IN the_DT constellations_NNS did_VBD not_RB vary_VB and_CC their_PRP$ paths_NNS were_VBD circular_JJ ._.
Moreover_RB ,_, the_DT sun_NN 's_POS path_NN over_IN earth_NN described_VBD a_DT segment_NN of_IN a_DT great_JJ circle_NN ;_: this_DT was_VBD clear_JJ from_IN the_DT contour_NN of_IN the_DT shadow_NN traced_VBN by_IN a_DT gnomon_NN before_IN and_CC after_IN noon_NN ._.
As_RB early_RB as_IN the_DT 0th_JJ century_NN B.C._NN the_DT earth_NN was_VBD seen_VBN to_TO be_VB spherical_JJ ._.
Ships_NNS disappear_VBP hull-first_RB over_IN the_DT horizon_NN ;_: approaching_VBG shore_JJ their_PRP$ masts_NNS appeared_VBD first_RB ._.
Earth_NN ,_, being_VBG at_IN the_DT center_NN of_IN the_DT universe_NN ,_, would_MD have_VB the_DT same_JJ shape_NN as_IN the_DT latter_NN ;_: so_RB ,_, e.g._FW did_VBD Aristotle_NNP argue_VB ,_, although_IN this_DT may_MD not_RB be_VB an_DT observational_JJ reason_NN in_IN favor_NN of_IN circularity_NN ._.
The_DT discoid_JJ shapes_NNS of_IN sun_NN and_CC moon_NN were_VBD also_RB felt_VBN to_TO indicate_VB the_DT shape_NN of_IN celestial_JJ things_NNS ._.
In_IN light_NN of_IN all_PDT this_DT ,_, one_NN would_MD require_VB special_JJ reasons_NNS for_IN saying_VBG that_IN the_DT paths_NNS of_IN the_DT heavenly_JJ bodies_NNS were_VBD other_JJ than_IN circular_JJ ._.
Why_WRB ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, should_MD the_DT ancients_NNS have_VB supposed_VBN the_DT diurnal_JJ rotation_NN of_IN the_DT heavens_NNS to_TO be_VB elliptical_JJ ?_.
Or_CC oviform_JJ ?_.
Or_CC angular_JJ ?_.
There_EX were_VBD no_DT reasons_NNS for_IN such_DT suppositions_NNS then_RB ._.
This_DT ,_, conjoined_VBN with_IN the_DT considerations_NNS above_RB ,_, made_VBD the_DT circular_JJ motions_NNS of_IN heavenly_JJ bodies_NNS appear_VB an_DT almost_RB directly_RB observed_VBN fact_NN ._.
Additional_JJ philosophical_JJ considerations_NNS ,_, advanced_VBN notably_RB by_IN Aristotle_NNP ,_, supported_VBD further_RB the_DT circularity_NN principle_NN ._.
By_IN distinguishing_VBG superlunary_JJ (_-LRB- celestial_JJ )_-RRB- and_CC sublunary_JJ (_-LRB- terrestrial_JJ )_-RRB- existence_NN ,_, and_CC reinforcing_VBG this_DT with_IN the_DT four-element_JJ physics_NN of_IN Empedocles_NNP ,_, Aristotle_NNP came_VBD to_TO speak_VB of_IN the_DT stars_NNS as_IN perfect_JJ bodies_NNS ,_, which_WDT moved_VBD in_IN only_RB a_DT perfect_JJ way_NN ,_, viz._NN in_IN a_DT perfect_JJ circle_NN ._.
Now_RB what_WP is_VBZ perfect_JJ motion_NN ?_.

Here_RB in_IN an_DT evening_NN Persians_NNPS enjoy_VBP many_JJ of_IN the_DT things_NNS which_WDT are_VBP important_JJ to_IN them_PRP :_: poetry_NN ,_, water_NN ,_, the_DT moon_NN ,_, a_DT beautiful_JJ face_NN ._.

Above_IN all_DT ,_, they_PRP will_MD stop_VB in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN anything_NN ,_, anywhere_RB ,_, to_TO hear_VB or_CC quote_VB some_DT poetry_NN ._.
Poetry_NN in_IN Persian_JJ life_NN is_VBZ far_RB more_RBR than_IN a_DT common_JJ ground_NN on_IN which_WDT --_: in_IN a_DT society_NN deeply_RB fissured_VBN by_IN antagonisms_NNS --_: all_DT may_MD stand_VB ._.

In_IN most_JJS Western_JJ cultures_NNS today_NN these_DT twins_NNS have_VBP been_VBN sent_VBN away_RB to_IN the_DT libraries_NNS and_CC museums_NNS ._.
In_IN Persia_NNP ,_, where_WRB practically_RB speaking_VBG there_EX are_VBP no_DT museums_NNS or_CC libraries_NNS or_CC ,_, for_IN that_DT matter_NN ,_, hardly_RB any_DT books_NNS ,_, the_DT twins_NNS run_VBP free_RB ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ perhaps_RB difficult_JJ to_TO conceive_VB ,_, but_CC imagine_VB that_DT tonight_NN on_IN London_NNP bridge_NN the_DT Teddy_NNP boys_NNS of_IN the_DT East_NNP End_NNP will_MD gather_VB to_TO sing_VB Marlowe_NNP ,_, Herrick_NNP ,_, Shakespeare_NNP ,_, and_CC perhaps_RB some_DT lyrics_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ ._.
That_IN ,_, at_IN any_DT rate_NN ,_, is_VBZ what_WP happens_VBZ at_IN the_DT Khaju_NNP bridge_NN ._.
Boys_NNS and_CC men_NNS go_VBP along_IN the_DT riverbank_NN or_CC to_IN the_DT alcoves_NNS in_IN the_DT top_JJ arcade_NN ._.

William_NNP ,_, who_WP lived_VBD in_IN neighboring_VBG St._NNP Mary_NNP 's_POS parish_NN ,_, had_VBD taken_VBN charge_NN and_CC decided_VBN that_IN it_PRP would_MD be_VB best_JJS for_IN all_DT if_IN the_DT plantation_NN were_VBD operated_VBN for_IN another_DT year_NN ._.
Giffen_NNP advised_VBD acceptance_NN of_IN this_DT plan_NN ,_, citing_VBG the_DT depressed_JJ market_NN for_IN land_NN then_RB prevailing_VBG and_CC the_DT large_JJ stock_NN of_IN provisions_NNS at_IN the_DT plantation_NN ._.
If_IN sold_VBN then_RB ,_, the_DT land_NN and_CC improvements_NNS might_MD bring_VB only_RB $_$ 0,000_CD ._.
Early_RB in_IN January_NNP ,_, 1900_CD he_PRP had_VBD a_DT conference_NN with_IN Henry_NNP and_CC William_NNP in_IN New_NNP Orleans_NNP ,_, and_CC upon_IN learning_VBG of_IN Gorham_NNP 's_POS intention_NN ,_, Henry_NNP remonstrated_VBD calmly_RB but_CC firmly_RB with_IN his_PRP$ brother_NN ._.
The_DT emancipation_NN plan_NN would_MD not_RB only_RB be_VB injurious_JJ to_IN all_PDT the_DT heirs_NNS ,_, he_PRP contended_VBD ,_, but_CC would_MD be_VB a_DT form_NN of_IN cruelty_NN perpetrated_VBN on_IN the_DT hapless_JJ Negroes_NNPS ._.
They_PRP were_VBD not_RB capable_JJ of_IN supporting_VBG themselves_PRP off_IN the_DT plantation_NN ,_, and_CC Louisiana_NNP law_NN required_VBD their_PRP$ removal_NN from_IN the_DT state_NN ._.
Gorham_NNP refused_VBD to_TO accept_VB money_NN for_IN slave_NN property_NN ,_, but_CC did_VBD he_PRP realize_VB how_WRB much_JJ expense_NN and_CC trouble_NN the_DT transportation_NN of_IN his_PRP$ Negroes_NNPS to_IN the_DT North_NNP involved_VBN ?_.
The_DT suggestion_NN that_IN Giffen_NNP hire_VB out_RP the_DT slaves_NNS was_VBD not_RB realistic_JJ ,_, since_IN no_DT planter_NN would_MD take_VB the_DT risk_NN of_IN having_VBG Negroes_NNPS who_WP knew_VBD they_PRP were_VBD to_TO be_VB free_JJ living_VBG with_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ slaves_NNS ._.
Henry_NNP hid_VBD his_PRP$ annoyance_NN ,_, although_IN both_DT he_PRP and_CC William_NNP were_VBD furious_JJ with_IN their_PRP$ Yankee_NNP brother_NN ._.
William_NNP ,_, who_WP did_VBD not_RB write_VB to_IN Gorham_NNP ,_, told_VBD Giffen_NNP that_IN unless_IN he_PRP could_MD operate_VB the_DT plantation_NN as_IN usual_JJ for_IN a_DT year_NN ,_, he_PRP would_MD sue_VB "_`` amicably_RB "_'' to_TO protect_VB his_PRP$ interests_NNS ._.
Palfrey_NNP was_VBD determined_VBN that_IN his_PRP$ portion_NN of_IN the_DT slaves_NNS be_VB converted_VBN to_IN wage_NN laborers_NNS during_IN the_DT transition_NN period_NN before_IN emancipation_NN ._.
If_IN William_NNP wished_VBD to_TO continue_VB operations_NNS for_IN a_DT year_NN ,_, why_WRB not_RB simply_RB leave_VB the_DT Negroes_NNPS undisturbed_JJ and_CC pay_VB them_PRP "_`` as_RB high_JJ wages_NNS to_TO remain_VB there_RB as_RB are_VBP ever_RB paid_VBN the_DT labor_NN of_IN persons_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ sex_NN &_CC age_NN ._.
A_DT disposition_NN to_TO exert_VB themselves_PRP for_IN my_PRP$ benefit_NN would_MD perhaps_RB be_VB a_DT motive_NN with_IN some_DT of_IN them_PRP to_TO come_VB into_IN the_DT scheme_NN ._.
Their_PRP$ having_VBG family_NN ties_NNS on_IN our_PRP$ plantation_NN &_CC the_DT adjoining_VBG one_CD would_MD be_VB a_DT stronger_JJR inducement_NN "_'' ._.
When_WRB he_PRP heard_VBD of_IN his_PRP$ brothers_NNS '_POS anger_NN ,_, Palfrey_NNP was_VBD still_RB hopeful_JJ that_IN they_PRP could_MD be_VB persuaded_VBN to_TO accept_VB his_PRP$ notion_NN of_IN paying_VBG wages_NNS ._.
If_IN not_RB ,_, he_PRP was_VBD willing_JJ to_TO accede_VB to_IN William_NNP 's_POS wishes_NNS in_IN any_DT way_NN that_WDT did_VBD not_RB block_VB his_PRP$ ultimate_JJ aim_NN ._.
William_NNP was_VBD adamant_JJ on_IN one_CD point_NN :_: under_IN no_DT circumstances_NNS would_MD he_PRP allow_VB the_DT Negroes_NNPS to_TO remain_VB on_IN the_DT plantation_NN with_IN his_PRP$ and_CC Henry_NNP 's_POS slaves_NNS if_IN they_PRP were_VBD told_VBN of_IN their_PRP$ coming_JJ freedom_NN ._.
Knowing_VBG the_DT antipathy_NN that_WDT existed_VBD in_IN Louisiana_NNP against_IN increasing_VBG the_DT number_NN of_IN free_JJ Negroes_NNPS ,_, Giffen_NNP suggested_VBD that_IN Palfrey_NNP bring_VB them_PRP to_IN Boston_NNP at_IN once_RB ,_, and_CC then_RB send_VB them_PRP on_IN to_IN Liberia_NNPS ._.
Lacking_VBG specific_JJ instructions_NNS ,_, he_PRP agreed_VBD to_IN William_NNP 's_POS condition_NN ._.

Of_IN the_DT fifty-two_CD slaves_NNS ,_, Giffen_NNP succeeded_VBD in_IN getting_VBG a_DT lot_NN of_IN twenty_CD ,_, twelve_CD of_IN whom_WP were_VBD females_NNS ._.
"_`` I_PRP considered_VBD that_IN your_PRP$ views_NNS would_MD be_VB best_RBS carried_VBN out_RP "_'' ,_, he_PRP explained_VBD ,_, "_`` by_IN taking_VBG women_NNS whose_WP$ progeny_NN will_MD of_IN course_NN be_VB free_JJ &_CC more_RBR fully_RB extend_VB the_DT philantrophy_NN of_IN Emancipation_NNP ._.
I_PRP have_VBP also_RB taken_VBN the_DT old_JJ servants_NNS of_IN your_PRP$ father_NN as_IN a_DT matter_NN of_IN Conscience_NN &_CC Justice_NN "_'' ._.
The_DT ages_NNS of_IN the_DT slaves_NNS ranged_VBD from_IN sixty-five_CD ,_, for_IN an_DT old_JJ house_NN servant_NN ,_, to_IN an_DT unnamed_JJ newborn_JJ child_NN ._.
If_IN Palfrey_NNP ever_RB had_VBD any_DT doubts_NNS about_IN the_DT wickedness_NN of_IN slavery_NN ,_, they_PRP were_VBD put_VBN aside_RB after_IN he_PRP received_VBD an_DT inventory_NN of_IN the_DT slave_NN property_NN he_PRP had_VBD inherited_VBN ._.
This_DT cold_JJ reckoning_NN of_IN human_JJ worth_NN in_IN a_DT legal_JJ paper_NN ,_, devoid_JJ of_IN compassion_NN or_CC humanity_NN ,_, was_VBD all_DT he_PRP needed_VBD ._.
Each_DT human_JJ being_NN ,_, known_VBN only_RB by_IN a_DT given_VBN name_NN ,_, had_VBD a_DT cash_NN value_NN ._.

Giffen_NNP extracted_VBD one_CD concession_NN from_IN William_NNP :_: the_DT house_NN servants_NNS could_MD be_VB free_JJ at_IN any_DT time_NN Gorham_NNP thought_VBD expedient_JJ ._.
Despite_IN Giffen_NNP 's_POS warning_NN ,_, Palfrey_NNP still_RB had_VBD plans_NNS for_IN freeing_VBG his_PRP$ slaves_NNS in_IN Louisiana_NNP ._.
Yet_RB even_RB if_IN he_PRP could_MD get_VB the_DT necessary_JJ approval_NN ,_, fourteen_CD of_IN his_PRP$ Negroes_NNPS could_MD not_RB be_VB manumitted_VBN without_IN special_JJ permission_NN ._.

Palfrey_NNP petitioned_VBD the_DT state_NN legislature_NN to_TO waive_VB the_DT requirement_NN ._.
Otherwise_RB ,_, freedom_NN would_MD mean_VB removal_NN from_IN the_DT state_NN in_IN which_WDT "_`` as_IN the_DT place_NN of_IN their_PRP$ past_JJ residence_NN from_IN birth_NN ,_, or_CC for_IN many_JJ years_NNS ,_, it_PRP would_MD be_VB materially_RB for_IN their_PRP$ advantage_NN to_TO be_VB at_IN liberty_NN to_TO remain_VB "_'' ._.
On_IN March_NNP 00_CD the_DT Louisiana_NNP legislature_NN voted_VBD unanimously_RB to_TO table_VB the_DT petition_NN ._.
News_NNP of_IN the_DT legislative_JJ veto_NN appeared_VBD in_IN the_DT New_NNP Orleans_NNP papers_NNS ,_, and_CC Henry_NNP and_CC William_NNP became_VBD incensed_VBN by_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN they_PRP had_VBD not_RB been_VBN told_VBN of_IN the_DT attempt_NN in_IN advance_NN ._.
Henry_NNP stormed_VBD into_IN Giffen_NNP 's_POS office_NN waving_VBG a_DT copy_NN of_IN the_DT New_NNP Orleans_NNP Courier_NNP ,_, shouting_VBG that_IN the_DT emancipation_NN scheme_NN had_VBD become_VBN a_DT public_JJ affair_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN it_PRP would_MD reach_VB the_DT "_`` Ears_NNS of_IN the_DT People_NNS on_IN the_DT Plantation_NN ,_, and_CC make_VB them_PRP restless_JJ &_CC unhappy_JJ "_'' ._.
His_PRP$ brothers_NNS '_POS anger_NN caused_VBN Palfrey_NNP genuine_JJ concern_NN ,_, for_IN he_PRP had_VBD imposed_VBN a_DT dual_JJ mission_NN upon_IN himself_PRP :_: to_TO free_VB his_PRP$ slaves_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO keep_VB the_DT family_NN from_IN falling_VBG apart_RB over_IN the_DT issue_NN ._.
When_WRB Giffen_NNP decided_VBD to_TO charge_VB him_PRP interest_NN on_IN the_DT loan_NN from_IN John_NNP Palfrey_NNP ,_, Gorham_NNP readily_RB assented_VBD ,_, vowing_VBG that_IN in_IN a_DT matter_NN of_IN dollars_NNS and_CC cents_NNS ,_, his_PRP$ brothers_NNS would_MD never_RB have_VB any_DT cause_NN to_TO complain_VB of_IN him_PRP ._.
In_IN view_NN of_IN these_DT difficulties_NNS ,_, Palfrey_NNP decided_VBD to_TO go_VB to_IN Louisiana_NNP ._.
Giffen_NNP had_VBD already_RB urged_VBN him_PRP to_TO journey_VB south_RB ,_, if_IN only_RB for_IN a_DT few_DT days_NNS to_TO clear_VB up_RP matters_NNS ._.
His_PRP$ duties_NNS as_IN Massachusetts_NNP Secretary_NNP of_IN State_NNP obliged_VBD him_PRP to_TO wait_VB until_IN the_DT adjournment_NN of_IN the_DT legislature_NN in_IN mid-April_NN ._.
Palfrey_NNP told_VBD his_PRP$ wife_NN of_IN his_PRP$ intentions_NNS for_IN the_DT first_JJ time_NN ,_, and_CC left_VBD for_IN New_NNP Orleans_NNP apprehensively_RB invoking_VBG a_DT special_JJ blessing_NN of_IN Providence_NNP that_IN he_PRP might_MD be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO see_VB his_PRP$ family_NN again_RB ._.
During_IN his_PRP$ journey_NN Palfrey_NNP stopped_VBD off_RP to_TO see_VB two_CD abolitionists_NNS ._.
In_IN both_DT cases_NNS he_PRP desired_VBD information_NN about_IN placing_VBG the_DT freedmen_NNS in_IN homes_NNS once_IN they_PRP arrived_VBD in_IN the_DT North_NNP ._.
In_IN New_NNP York_NNP ,_, Lydia_NNP Maria_NNP Child_NNP welcomed_VBD him_PRP enthusiastically_RB :_: "_`` I_PRP have_VBP lately_RB heard_VBN of_IN you_PRP from_IN the_DT Legislature_NNP of_IN Louisiana_NNP ,_, and_CC felt_VBD joy_NN at_IN your_PRP$ public_JJ recognition_NN of_IN the_DT brotherhood_NN of_IN man_NN "_'' ._.
Mrs._NNP Child_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD once_RB apologized_VBN for_IN sending_VBG editor_NN Palfrey_NNP a_DT book_NN on_IN slavery_NN ,_, now_RB confided_VBD that_IN she_PRP had_VBD helped_VBN one_CD of_IN Henry_NNP Palfrey_NNP 's_POS slaves_NNS escape_VB to_IN Canada_NNP some_DT years_NNS before_RB ,_, but_CC asked_VBD him_PRP not_RB to_TO advertise_VB the_DT fact_NN in_IN Louisiana_NNP ._.
She_PRP agreed_VBD to_TO take_VB charge_NN of_IN five_CD or_CC six_CD of_IN the_DT Negroes_NNPS should_MD Palfrey_NNP decide_VB to_TO send_VB them_PRP north_RB immediately_RB ._.
At_IN Lexington_NNP ,_, Kentucky_NNP ,_, Palfrey_NNP consulted_VBD with_IN Cassius_NNP M._NNP Clay_NNP on_IN the_DT same_JJ subject_NN ,_, but_CC with_IN no_DT apparent_JJ result_NN ._.
Despite_IN his_PRP$ apprehensions_NNS about_IN his_PRP$ personal_JJ safety_NN ,_, Palfrey_NNP 's_POS reception_NN in_IN New_NNP Orleans_NNP was_VBD more_RBR than_IN cordial_JJ ._.
Instead_RB of_IN the_DT expected_JJ "_`` annoyances_NNS "_'' due_JJ to_IN the_DT nature_NN of_IN his_PRP$ mission_NN ,_, he_PRP received_VBD many_JJ calling_NN cards_NNS and_CC invitations_NNS from_IN "_`` gentlemen_NNS of_IN mark_NN ,_, on_IN whom_WP I_PRP had_VBD no_DT sort_NN of_IN claim_NN ,_, &_CC have_VBP had_VBD many_RB more_JJR invitations_NNS than_IN I_PRP could_MD accept_VB "_'' ._.
He_PRP later_RB told_VBD abolitionist_NN Edmund_NNP Quincy_NNP of_IN the_DT "_`` marked_JJ attention_NN and_CC civility_NN "_'' with_IN which_WDT the_DT New_NNP Orleans_NNP gentlemen_NNS and_CC the_DT upriver_JJ planters_NNS greeted_VBD him_PRP ._.

Palfrey_NNP had_VBD already_RB made_VBN up_RP his_PRP$ mind_NN that_IN he_PRP would_MD allow_VB the_DT men_NNS ,_, but_CC not_RB the_DT women_NNS ,_, to_TO choose_VB freely_RB whether_IN or_CC not_RB to_TO go_VB North_NNP for_IN freedom_NN ._.
The_DT women_NNS by_IN remaining_VBG behind_RB condemned_VBD their_PRP$ children_NNS ,_, born_VBN and_CC unborn_JJ ,_, to_IN bondage_NN ._.

Only_RB one_NN objected_VBD ,_, but_CC Palfrey_NNP soon_RB convinced_VBD him_PRP that_IN he_PRP ought_MD to_TO go_VB with_IN the_DT others_NNS ._.
All_PDT the_DT slaves_NNS joined_VBD in_IN requesting_VBG that_IN they_PRP be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO delay_VB their_PRP$ departure_NN until_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT planting_NN season_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN they_PRP could_MD get_VB in_RP "_`` their_PRP$ own_JJ little_JJ produce_NN "_'' ._.
Palfrey_NNP agreed_VBD ;_: the_DT slaves_NNS were_VBD to_TO remain_VB as_IN wage_NN laborers_NNS for_IN his_PRP$ account_NN ._.

Palfrey_NNP returned_VBD to_IN Massachusetts_NNP greatly_RB relieved_VBN to_TO have_VB made_VBN an_DT arrangement_NN "_`` so_RB satisfactory_JJ to_IN my_PRP$ judgment_NN &_CC my_PRP$ conscience_NN "_'' ._.
From_IN Cambridge_NNP ,_, Palfrey_NNP maintained_VBD a_DT close_JJ interest_NN in_IN the_DT welfare_NN of_IN his_PRP$ slaves_NNS ._.
In_IN fact_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT time_NN for_IN their_PRP$ departure_NN approached_VBD ,_, his_PRP$ solicitousness_NN increased_VBN ._.
Should_MD any_DT slave_NN change_VB his_PRP$ mind_NN and_CC request_VB to_TO leave_VB earlier_RBR ,_, Giffen_NNP was_VBD to_TO provide_VB passage_NN at_IN once_RB ._.
When_WRB a_DT sailing_NN date_NN of_IN March_NNP ,_, 1900_CD was_VBD finally_RB established_VBN ,_, Palfrey_NNP made_VBD sure_JJ that_IN the_DT Negroes_NNPS would_MD have_VB comfortable_JJ quarters_NNS in_IN New_NNP Orleans_NNP and_CC aboard_IN ship_NN ._.
Giffen_NNP assured_VBD him_PRP that_IN the_DT captain_NN and_CC his_PRP$ mate_NN had_VBD personally_RB promised_VBN to_TO treat_VB the_DT Negroes_NNPS with_IN consideration_NN ._.
Palfrey_NNP was_VBD also_RB concerned_VBN about_IN the_DT question_NN of_IN what_WP wage_NN to_TO pay_VB for_IN their_PRP$ labor_NN throughout_IN 1900_CD ._.
The_DT plantation_NN was_VBD sold_VBN in_IN January_NNP ,_, 1900_CD ,_, and_CC Palfrey_NNP thought_VBD the_DT new_JJ owner_NN ought_MD to_TO pay_VB his_PRP$ people_NNS two_CD months_NNS '_POS wages_NNS ._.
Giffen_NNP suggested_VBD fifty_CD dollars_NNS as_IN fair_JJ compensation_NN for_IN a_DT year_NN 's_POS work_NN ;_: the_DT new_JJ owner_NN at_IN Attakapas_NNP declined_VBD to_TO enter_VB into_IN any_DT philanthropic_JJ arrangement_NN ._.
On_IN March_NNP 00_CD ,_, 1900_CD the_DT bark_NN Bashaw_NNP weighed_VBD anchor_NN at_IN New_NNP Orleans_NNP ,_, while_IN on_IN the_DT levee_NN Henry_NNP and_CC William_NNP Palfrey_NNP waved_VBD farewell_NN to_IN their_PRP$ father_NN 's_POS former_JJ chattels_NNS who_WP must_MD have_VB looked_VBD back_RB at_IN the_DT receding_JJ shore_NN with_IN mingled_JJ regret_NN and_CC jubilation_NN ._.
Not_RB all_DT of_IN Palfrey_NNP 's_POS slaves_NNS were_VBD aboard_IN the_DT Bashaw_NNP ._.
Giffen_NNP had_VBD advised_VBN that_IN it_PRP would_MD not_RB be_VB too_RB difficult_JJ to_TO obtain_VB freedom_NN locally_RB for_IN the_DT old_JJ house_NN servants_NNS ._.
Two_CD of_IN these_DT were_VBD included_VBN in_IN Palfrey_NNP 's_POS lot_NN ._.
Giffen_NNP filed_VBD a_DT petition_NN for_IN permission_NN to_TO emancipate_VB four_CD slaves_NNS (_-LRB- all_DT more_JJR than_IN fifty_CD years_NNS old_JJ )_-RRB- with_IN the_DT St._NNP Martin_NNP 's_POS Parish_NNP Police_NNP Jury_NNP ._.
After_IN an_DT initial_JJ rejection_NN ,_, which_WDT he_PRP attributed_VBD to_IN a_DT "_`` general_JJ Excitement_NN against_IN Abolition_NNP and_CC Emancipation_NNP "_'' ,_, Giffen_NNP bribed_VBD the_DT right_JJ individuals_NNS on_IN the_DT jury_NN ,_, and_CC got_VBD the_DT permission_NN without_IN further_JJR delay_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT Negroes_NNPS landed_VBD at_IN Boston_NNP a_DT month_NN later_RBR they_PRP were_VBD ,_, of_IN course_NN ,_, no_DT longer_JJR slaves_NNS ._.
Slavery_NN was_VBD prohibited_VBN in_IN Massachusetts_NNP by_IN the_DT terms_NNS of_IN the_DT constitution_NN of_IN 1900_CD ,_, which_WDT declared_VBD "_`` all_DT men_NNS are_VBP born_VBN free_JJ and_CC equal_JJ "_'' ._.
Nevertheless_RB ,_, Palfrey_NNP arranged_VBD a_DT religious_JJ ceremony_NN at_IN King_NN 's_POS Chapel_NN to_TO formalize_VB the_DT emancipation_NN ._.
An_DT eyewitness_NN recalled_VBD how_WRB awkward_JJ the_DT red-turbaned_JJ colored_JJ women_NNS appeared_VBD as_IN they_PRP curtseyed_VBD in_IN the_DT church_NN doorway_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT diffidence_NN the_DT former_JJ slaves_NNS displayed_VBN while_IN they_PRP listened_VBD to_IN the_DT few_DT words_NNS that_WDT declared_VBD them_PRP free_JJ ._.
Once_RB the_DT question_NN of_IN emancipation_NN was_VBD settled_VBN to_IN Palfrey_NNP 's_POS satisfaction_NN ,_, he_PRP faced_VBD a_DT real_JJ problem_NN in_IN placing_VBG the_DT freedmen_NNS in_IN suitable_JJ homes_NNS as_IN servants_NNS ._.
Palfrey_NNP tried_VBD fruitlessly_RB to_TO place_VB a_DT Negro_NNP boy_NN in_IN the_DT Hopedale_NNP Community_NNP ,_, but_CC he_PRP had_VBD better_JJR luck_NN in_IN his_PRP$ other_JJ attempts_NNS ._.
Mrs._NNP Child_NNP ,_, true_JJ to_IN her_PRP word_NN ,_, helped_VBD place_VB Anna_NNP and_CC her_PRP$ four_CD children_NNS with_IN a_DT Quaker_NNP family_NN named_VBD Hathaway_NNP near_IN Canandaigua_NNP ,_, New_NNP York_NNP ._.
This_DT group_NN had_VBD been_VBN Palfrey_NNP 's_POS greatest_JJS worry_NN since_IN Anna_NNP was_VBD in_IN bad_JJ health_NN ,_, and_CC her_PRP$ children_NNS were_VBD too_RB young_JJ to_TO work_VB for_IN their_PRP$ keep_NN ._.
Except_IN for_IN the_DT wine_NN waiter_NN in_IN a_DT restaurant_NN --_: always_RB an_DT inscrutable_JJ plenipotentiary_NN unto_IN himself_PRP ,_, the_DT genii_NN with_IN the_DT keys_NNS to_TO unlock_VB the_DT gates_NNS of_IN the_DT wine_NN world_NN are_VBP one_PRP 's_POS dealer_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT foreign_JJ shipper_NN or_CC negociant_NN who_WP in_IN turn_NN supplies_VBZ him_PRP ._.
In_IN instances_NNS where_WRB both_DT of_IN these_DT are_VBP persons_NNS or_CC firms_NNS with_IN integrity_NN ,_, the_DT situation_NN is_VBZ ideal_JJ ._.
It_PRP may_MD ,_, on_IN occasion_NN ,_, be_VB anything_NN but_IN that_DT ._.

Bruises_NNS and_CC black_JJ eyes_NNS were_VBD relieved_VBN by_IN application_NN of_IN raw_JJ beefsteak_NN ._.
(_-LRB- Doctors_NNS now_RB say_VBP that_IN it_PRP was_VBD not_RB the_DT meat_NN but_CC the_DT coolness_NN of_IN the_DT applications_NNS which_WDT relieved_VBD the_DT pain_NN ._. )_-RRB-

The_DT uses_NNS of_IN power_NN

Communist_JJ gains_NNS

The_DT cry_NN "_`` Garryowen_NNP !_. "_'' Bursting_VBG from_IN the_DT lips_NNS of_IN a_DT charging_JJ cavalry_NN trooper_NN was_VBD the_DT last_JJ sound_NN heard_VBN on_IN this_DT earth_NN by_IN untold_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN Cheyennes_NNPS ,_, Sioux_NNPS and_CC Apaches_NNPS ,_, Mexican_JJ banditos_NNS under_IN Pancho_NNP Villa_NNP ,_, Japanese_NNPS in_IN the_DT South_NNP Pacific_NNP ,_, and_CC Chinese_NNP and_CC North_NNP Korean_NNP Communists_NNS in_IN Korea_NNP ._.

First_JJ of_IN all_DT ,_, no_DT unit_NN likes_VBZ to_TO have_VB a_DT new_JJ CO_NNP brought_VBD in_RP from_IN the_DT outside_NN ,_, especially_RB when_WRB he_PRP 's_VBZ an_DT armchair_NN trooper_NN ._.
Second_RB ,_, if_IN there_EX is_VBZ ever_RB a_DT perfect_JJ time_NN to_TO pull_VB the_DT rug_NN out_RP from_IN under_IN him_PRP ,_, it_PRP 's_VBZ on_IN maneuvers_NNS ._.

While_IN a_DT wind_NN wave_NN never_RB travels_VBZ at_IN more_RBR than_IN 00_CD miles_NNS per_IN hour_NN ,_, the_DT velocity_NN of_IN a_DT tsunami_NN in_IN the_DT open_JJ sea_NN must_MD be_VB reckoned_VBN in_IN hundreds_NNS of_IN miles_NNS per_IN hour_NN ._.

Thomas_NNP Douglas_NNP ,_, fifth_JJ Earl_NNP of_IN Selkirk_NNP ,_, a_DT noble_JJ humanitarian_NN Scot_NN concerned_VBN with_IN the_DT plight_NN of_IN the_DT crofters_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ native_JJ Highlands_NNS ,_, conceived_VBD a_DT plan_NN to_TO settle_VB them_PRP in_IN the_DT valley_NN of_IN the_DT Red_NNP River_NNP of_IN the_DT North_NNP ._.

By_IN October_NNP the_DT little_JJ colony_NN about_IN Fort_NNP Douglas_NNP (_-LRB- present-day_JJ Winnipeg_NNP )_-RRB- numbered_VBD 000_CD ._.

It_PRP was_VBD the_DT low_JJ yield_NN of_IN the_DT Selkirk_NNP plots_NNS and_CC the_DT ravages_NNS of_IN grasshoppers_NNS in_IN 1900_CD that_IN led_VBN to_IN the_DT dispersal_NN of_IN the_DT settlement_NN southward_RB ._.

Farming_NN is_VBZ confining_VBG ._.
The_DT farmer_NN 's_POS life_NN must_MD be_VB arranged_VBN to_TO meet_VB the_DT demands_NNS of_IN crops_NNS and_CC livestock_NN ._.
Livestock_NN must_MD be_VB tended_VBN every_DT day_NN ,_, routinely_RB ._.
A_DT slight_JJ change_NN in_IN the_DT work_NN schedule_NN may_MD cut_VB the_DT production_NN of_IN cows_NNS or_CC chickens_NNS ._.
Even_RB if_IN there_EX are_VBP no_DT livestock_NN ,_, the_DT farmer_NN can_MD not_RB leave_VB the_DT farm_NN for_IN long_JJ periods_NNS ,_, particularly_RB during_IN the_DT growing_JJ season_NN ._.
The_DT worker_NN who_WP lives_VBZ on_IN a_DT farm_NN can_MD not_RB change_VB jobs_NNS readily_RB ._.
He_PRP can_MD not_RB leave_VB the_DT farm_NN to_TO take_VB work_NN in_IN another_DT locality_NN on_IN short_JJ notice_NN ;_: such_PDT a_DT move_NN may_MD mean_VB a_DT loss_NN of_IN capital_NN ._.
Hard_JJ physical_JJ labor_NN and_CC undesirable_JJ hours_NNS are_VBP a_DT part_NN of_IN life_NN ._.
The_DT farmer_NN must_MD get_VB up_RP early_RB ,_, and_CC ,_, at_IN times_NNS ,_, work_VB late_RB at_IN night_NN ._.
Frequently_RB he_PRP must_MD work_VB long_JJ hours_NNS in_IN the_DT hot_JJ sun_NN or_CC cold_JJ rain_NN ._.
No_DT matter_NN how_WRB well_JJ work_NN is_VBZ planned_VBN ,_, bad_JJ weather_NN or_CC unexpected_JJ setbacks_NNS can_MD cause_VB extra_JJ work_NN that_WDT must_MD be_VB caught_VBN up_RP ._.
It_PRP may_MD not_RB be_VB profitable_JJ for_IN a_DT part-time_JJ farmer_NN to_TO own_VB the_DT labor-saving_JJ machinery_NN that_IN a_DT full-time_JJ farmer_NN can_MD invest_VB in_IN profitably_RB ._.
Production_NN may_MD fall_VB far_RB below_IN expectations_NNS ._.
Drought_NN ,_, hail_NN ,_, disease_NN ,_, and_CC insects_NNS take_VBP their_PRP$ toll_NN of_IN crops_NNS ._.
Sickness_NN or_CC loss_NN of_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT livestock_NN may_MD cut_VB into_IN the_DT owner_NN 's_POS earnings_NNS ,_, even_RB into_IN his_PRP$ capital_NN ._.
Returns_NNS for_IN money_NN and_CC labor_NN invested_VBN may_MD be_VB small_JJ even_RB in_IN a_DT good_JJ year_NN ._.
The_DT high_JJ cost_NN of_IN land_NN ,_, supplies_NNS ,_, and_CC labor_NN make_VBP it_PRP difficult_JJ to_TO farm_VB profitably_RB on_IN a_DT part-time_JJ basis_NN ._.
Land_NN within_IN commuting_NN distance_NN of_IN a_DT growing_JJ city_NN is_VBZ usually_RB high_JJ in_IN price_NN ,_, higher_RBR if_IN it_PRP has_VBZ subdivision_NN possibilities_NNS ._.
Part-time_JJ farmers_NNS generally_RB must_MD pay_VB higher_JJR prices_NNS for_IN supplies_NNS than_IN full-time_JJ farmers_NNS because_IN they_PRP buy_VBP in_IN smaller_JJR quantities_NNS ._.
If_IN the_DT farm_NN is_VBZ in_IN an_DT industrial_JJ area_NN where_WRB wages_NNS are_VBP high_JJ ,_, farm_NN labor_NN costs_NNS will_MD also_RB be_VB high_JJ ._.
A_DT part-time_JJ farmer_NN needs_VBZ unusual_JJ skill_NN to_TO get_VB as_IN high_JJ production_NN per_IN hen_NN ,_, per_IN cow_NN ,_, or_CC per_IN acre_NN as_IN can_MD be_VB obtained_VBN by_IN a_DT competent_JJ full-time_JJ farmer_NN ._.

There_EX will_MD be_VB losses_NNS caused_VBN by_IN emergencies_NNS that_WDT arise_VBP while_IN he_PRP is_VBZ away_RB at_IN his_PRP$ off-farm_JJ job_NN ._.
The_DT farm_NN may_MD be_VB an_DT additional_JJ burden_NN if_IN the_DT main_JJ job_NN is_VBZ lost_VBN ._.
This_DT may_MD be_VB true_JJ whether_IN the_DT farm_NN is_VBZ owned_VBN or_CC rented_VBN ._.
If_IN the_DT farm_NN is_VBZ rented_VBN ,_, the_DT rent_NN must_MD be_VB paid_VBN ._.

Advantages_NNS
A_DT farm_NN provides_VBZ a_DT wholesome_JJ and_CC healthful_JJ environment_NN for_IN children_NNS ._.
It_PRP gives_VBZ them_PRP room_NN to_TO play_VB and_CC plenty_RB of_IN fresh_JJ air_NN ._.
The_DT children_NNS can_MD do_VB chores_NNS adapted_VBN to_IN their_PRP$ age_NN and_CC ability_NN ._.
Caring_VBG for_IN a_DT calf_NN ,_, a_DT pig_NN ,_, or_CC some_DT chickens_NNS develops_VBZ in_IN children_NNS a_DT sense_NN of_IN responsibility_NN for_IN work_NN ._.
Part-time_JJ farming_NN gives_VBZ a_DT measure_NN of_IN security_NN if_IN the_DT regular_JJ job_NN is_VBZ lost_VBN ,_, provided_VBD the_DT farm_NN is_VBZ owned_VBN free_RB of_IN debt_NN and_CC furnishes_VBZ enough_DT income_NN to_TO meet_VB fixed_JJ expenses_NNS and_CC minimum_JJ living_NN costs_NNS ._.
For_IN some_DT retired_JJ persons_NNS ,_, part-time_JJ farming_NN is_VBZ a_DT good_JJ way_NN to_TO supplement_VB retirement_NN income_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ particularly_RB suitable_JJ for_IN those_DT who_WP need_VBP to_TO work_VB or_CC exercise_VB out_IN of_IN doors_NNS for_IN their_PRP$ health_NN ._.
Generally_RB ,_, the_DT same_JJ level_NN of_IN living_NN costs_VBZ less_JJR in_IN the_DT country_NN than_IN in_IN the_DT city_NN ._.
The_DT savings_NNS are_VBP not_RB as_RB great_JJ ,_, however_RB ,_, as_IN is_VBZ sometime_RB supposed_VBN ._.
Usually_RB ,_, the_DT cost_NN of_IN food_NN and_CC shelter_NN will_MD be_VB somewhat_RB less_JJR on_IN the_DT farm_NN and_CC the_DT cost_NN of_IN transportation_NN and_CC utilities_NNS somewhat_RB more_RBR ._.
Where_WRB schools_NNS ,_, fire_NN and_CC police_NN protection_NN ,_, and_CC similar_JJ municipal_JJ services_NNS are_VBP of_IN equal_JJ quality_NN in_IN city_NN and_CC country_NN ,_, real_JJ estate_NN taxes_NNS are_VBP usually_RB about_RB the_DT same_JJ ._.
A_DT part-time_JJ farmer_NN and_CC his_PRP$ family_NN can_MD use_VB their_PRP$ spare_JJ time_NN profitably_RB ._.

Dr._NNP Karlis_NNP Osis_NNP ,_, Director_NNP of_IN Research_NNP at_IN the_DT Parapsychology_NNP Foundation_NNP ,_, described_VBD the_DT basis_NN for_IN the_DT experiment_NN in_IN a_DT tomorrow_NN article_NN ,_, (_-LRB- "_`` New_NNP Research_NNP On_IN Survival_NNP After_IN Death_NNP "_'' ,_, Spring_NN 1900_CD )_-RRB- ._.

Homemade_NNP bread_NN
